General.Name: Profile Systems & Software SA
General.Description: Profile Systems & Software SA develops software solutions for the banking and investment management industry in Europe, the Middle East, America, Asia, and Africa. The company's products include Axia, a web-based omni-channel and MiFID II enabled investment management solution; Finuevo Digital, a digital banking platform; Finuevo Core, an API-driven, cloud-enabled and banking platform; Acumen.plus, a cloud-native platform for treasury and capital markets; and RiskAvert, a risk management solution that assists financial institutions to gather and reconcile data, as well as calculate, aggregate, and report regulatory credit, market, operational, and concentration risk. It offers Centevo Suite, a suite that enables asset managers to automate and streamline their daily activities; Registry, a system for monitoring and management of shareholders registry; GS Market suite, an application for the stock exchange market data; and Mobius Wealth, a mobile wealth management application that integrates with back-end system and uses data from existing systems, as well as compiles them into a single presentation. In addition, the company provides Profile Vote, an online voting system; and Plexus, an application that provides real-time market data. Further, it offers implementation and post-implementation services. Profile Systems & Software SA was founded in 1990 and is based in Athens, Greece.

5.Name: Mr. Dimitrios  Evangelou
5.Title: Head of the Internal Audit Department
